sentence.text: Identifying genetic risk alleles for ovarian cancer has had a significant negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II on disease prevention strategies; for example it is now routine clinical practice for individuals with germline double-strand break repair via homologous recombination and mitotic cytokinesis mutations to undergo risk reducing salpingo-oophorectomy.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
